price: Nuti numatu du’aa jiraachifna. Waan isaan hojjatanii dabarsaniifi hambaalee isaanii ni barreessina. Waan hundayyuu kitaaba ifa bahaa keessatti galmeessinee jirra.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَنَكۡتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُواْ وَءَاثَٰرَهُمۡۚ وَكُلَّ شَيۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَٰهُ فِيٓ إِمَامٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī al-mawtā wanaktubu mā qaddamū waāthārahum wakulla shayin aḥṣaynāhu fī imāmin mubīnin
